title: Interactive Multimedia-Based Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Scenario-based formative assessments to deliver personalized language content in smartphone learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can interact by selecting appropriate language expressions in three or more situational dialogue scenarios
Learners can revise personalized learning plans with over 80% accuracy based on formative assessment feedback twice weekly
Learners can create 5-minute or longer presentation materials using multimedia resources during team projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
